explanation: nCr(29+8-1,8-1) = nCr(36,7) ways to select at least 21 cans of coke ... nCr(57,7)-nCr(36,7) for at most 20 cases of coke
instructions: An employee of a grocery store is placing an order for soda. There are 8 varieties of soda and they are sold in cases. Each case contains all the same variety of soda. The store will order 50 cases total.
question:
(c)

How many ways are there to place the order if she does not order more than 20 cases of Coke?
section: Exercise 4.13.4: Ordering soda at a grocery store.
